name: Extreme Soccer Poppers Saga
description:
Soccer Poppers is the ultimate chain reaction game with so many levels you may never complete them all!

Game Objective:

-Pop all Soccer balls with a limited number of taps it's as simple as 1, 2, 3!

Extreme Soccer Poppers Saga Features:

-Power Up's will help you advance thew all the toughest levels!
-Get Free Hints Every Single Day!
-Full retina support
-Amazing graphics
-Addictive gameplay

So are you up for the challenge? Let's see how many levels you can beat!

Download now it's FREE!
